name: Spikey Boi Goes Punk
description:
Hedgehog finds his passion in jewel needlework.

Use mouse to aim and pierce. You can also grab moths for extra points.

Game made for Hardcore Punk Jam #3
Made by NaniKisuNami and Jolly Topple

nanikisunami.itch.io
jester-great.itch.io

Music is from Crate Punks OST
